# CACHE LPCAC

## [2.1.1]

- Bug Fixes
  - Fixed an issue of L1CACHE_InvalidateCodeCache() function, to clean cache the LPCAC_CTRL[CLR_LPCAC] should be
    set not clear.

## [2.1.0]

- Improvements
  - Supported more features, such as write buffer contron, write buffer limit and so on.

## [2.0.0]

- Initial version.
